Name: FreeBSD
License: BSD, GPL, LGPL software usually included

Name: GNU
Kernel type: Microkernel (Hurd kernel) or Monolithic (Linux-libre kernel, fork of Linux kernel, and other kernels which are not part of the GNU Project)
Oldest non-EOL versiona1: 2.4 on Linux-libre kernel (not on Hurd kernel)

Name: RTEMS
Kernel programming language: C and ASM with native support for other languages including C++ and Ada
